mil7.3.9:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kammakārassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.3.9:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kammakāro evaṃ cintayati ‘bhatako ahaṃ imāya nāvāya kammaṃ karomi, imāyāhaṃ nāvāya vāhasā bhattavetanaṃ labhāmi, na me pamādo karaṇīyo, appamādena me ayaṃ nāvā vāhetabbā’ti;
mil7.3.9:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena evaṃ cintayitabbaṃ ‘imaṃ kho ahaṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ kāyaṃ sammasanto satataṃ samitaṃ appamatto upaṭṭhitassati sato sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi parimuccissāmīti appamādo me karaṇīyo’ti.
mil7.3.9:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kammakārassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
